ch.intertec.storybook.jasper

Class ExportManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.intertec.storybook.jasper.ExportManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReportConstants

    public class ExportManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReportConstants
    Loads the manager as a singleton instance with the reports to be displayed.
    Author:
    Martin

      • export

        public static java.lang.String export(java.lang.String key,
                      ExportReport er)
        Exports the report into the given place in the given format.
        Parameters:
        key - the format the report is to be returned in.
        er - the ExportReport descriptor instance to run.
        Returns:
        the file name of the report created.
